Technical Support : Reading, interpreting, and working from technical manuals, blueprints, and, in some cases, electrical schematics. Safety Compliance : Adhering strictly to company safety protocols, including Lockout/Tagout (LOTO) procedures, and using appropriate PPE. Documentation : Maintaining detailed service records and reports of maintenance activities, often using computerized maintenance management systems (CMMS). Tool Operation : Utilizing hand tools, power tools, precision measuring instruments, and sometimes, welding or cutting torches to fabricate or repair parts. Skills & Expertise Mechanical Technician mechanical maintenance Employment Status Full Time Gender Only males are allowed to apply. Job Location Saudi Arabia Company Information Greenland Group. job_description: Officer/ Senior Officer, Internal Audit and Compliance : A Group of Industries Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List A Group of Industries Officer/ Senior Officer, Internal Audit and Compliance Application Deadline : 16 Mar 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: -- Location: Dhaka Salary: Negotiable Experience: 2 to 4 years Published: 14 Feb 2026 Applicants are encouraged to submit Video CV. To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA) in Accounting Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, Cost Accounting, or Business Administration CA / CACC / CMA / ACCA (Part-qualified) preferred Experience 2 to 4 years The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s): Food (Packaged)/Beverage, Agro based firms (incl. Agro Processing/Seed/GM) Responsibilities & Context 1. Internal Audit (Manufacturing & Operations) Conduct internal audits of factories, warehouses, and head office as per approved audit plan. Review production processes, BOM, yield, wastage, scrap, and rework controls . Audit WIP and finished goods valuation , production reporting, and cost variances. Review machine utilization, maintenance cost controls, and shutdown records . 2. Inventory & Store Control Audit Audit raw materials, packing materials, consumables, spares, and finished goods . Perform physical stock verification and reconcile with ERP and stock registers. Review controls over expired, damaged, obsolete, and slow-moving inventory . Verify GRN, material issue, return, transfer, and adjustment processes. 3. Compliance & Regulatory Review Ensure compliance with VAT, Tax, Customs, labor laws, environmental, fire & safety regulations relevant to manufacturing operations. Review VAT challans, returns, rebates, Mushak documents , and statutory registers. Monitor compliance with company policies, SOPs, delegated authority matrix , and regulatory requirements. 4. Procurement & Contract Compliance Audit purchase requisitions, CS, approvals, PO issuance, and vendor selection . Review compliance with procurement policy, LC/local purchase rules , and contract terms. Check price variances, emergency purchases, and related-party transactions . 5. Financial Control & Risk Management Audit petty cash, factory imprest, IOU, advances, and inter-unit transactions . Review expense controls, budget adherence, and cost allocation . Assist in risk assessment and development of risk-based audit plans . 6. ERP & Process Control Review ERP controls, user access rights, and segregation of duties (SoD) . Verify accuracy of system postings related to production, inventory, and costing . 7. Reporting & Follow-up Prepare internal audit and compliance reports with risk grading and recommendations. Conduct exit meetings with factory and department heads. Track and

ও শনিবার দুই দিন সাপ্তাহিক ছুটি। এছাড়া বছরে ২০ দিন নৈমিত্তিক ও ১২ দিন মেডিকেল ছুটি রয়েছে। ৩.প্রার্থীর বৈধ ড্রাইভিং লাইসেন্স থাকতে হবে এবং মোটর সাইকেল চালিয়ে মাঠ পর্যায়ে কাজ করতে হবে। নিজস্ব মোটর সাইকেল থাকা প্রার্থীদের অগ্রাধিকার দেওয়া হবে। ৪.শিক্ষানবিশকাল ০৪ (চার) মাস। তবে অধিকতর দক্ষতা সম্পন্ন প্রার্থীদের ক্ষেত্রে শিক্ষানবিশকাল শিথিলযোগ্য হতে পারে। ৫.কার্যক্রম বাস্তবায়নের স্বার্থে সংস্থার যেকোনো শাখা কার্যালয়ে কাজ করার মানসিকতা থাকতে হবে। আগ্রহী প্রার্থীদের আগামী ২৮/০২/২৬ খ্রিস্টাব্দে বিকাল ৫.০০ ঘটিকার মধ্যে এক কপি রঙ্গিন পাসপোর্ট সাইজ ছবি, সকল শিক্ষাগত যোগ্যতা, অভিজ্ঞতা ও জাতীয় পরিচয় পত্রের ফটোকপি সংযুক্ত করে কভার লেটারসহ সিভি হার্ডকপি ডাক যোগে নির্বাহী পরিচালক, সিডিএইচসি, দাস এন্ড ব্রাদার্স বিল্ডিং (৪র্থ তলা), আড়ৎপট্টি, খেয়াঘাট, গলাচিপা, পটুয়াখালী এই ঠিকানায় এবং সফ্ট কপি job_description: Officer / Sr. Officer, QA & QC (Lab) : A Growing Animal Feed Manufacturing Company Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List A Growing Animal Feed Manufacturing Company Officer / Sr. Officer, QA & QC (Lab) Application Deadline : 16 Mar 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: 5 Location: Anywhere in Bangladesh Salary: Negotiable Experience: 3 to 6 years Published: 14 Feb 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Chemistry Experience 3 to 6 years The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s): Agro based firms (incl. Agro Processing/Seed/GM), Agro based Startup, Dairy, Farming, Fisheries, Hatchery, Poultry Additional Requirements Proficiency in laboratory testing of feed ingredients and finished feed. Strong attention to detail and analytical mindset. Good communication and report writing skills in Bangla and English. Ability to work independently and in a team environment. Willingness to work in shift rosters. Willing to stay in the plant locations. Physically fit to perform duties in a factory/lab environment. Responsibilities & Context To ensure the quality and safety of raw materials, in-process materials, and finished goods by conducting laboratory testing and analysis as per defined protocols, regulatory standards, and company specifications. The role is essential to maintain feed quality for poultry, fish, and cattle to ensure optimal animal health and performance. Key Responsibilities: Receive, collect, and label samples of raw materials upon arrival and finished products as well. Conduct proximate analysis Perform physical and chemical analysis. Approve or reject raw materials based on test results and specifications. Maintain proper documentation of all test results. Perform routine tests of finished products to ensure consistency and target specifications and alert the production team in case of any deviation from process parameters. Calibrate, maintain, and troubleshoot lab instruments. Maintain records as per ISO 22000:2018 and regulatory standards. Assist in preparing SOPs, test protocols, and quality manuals. Report deviations, non-conformities, and corrective/preventive actions to QA/QC Manager. Coordinate with procurement, production, and R&D for quality-related matters. Support product traceability and recall operations when necessary. Payroll Executive Application Deadline : 28 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: 1 Age: 25 to 35 years Location: Chattogram Salary: Negotiable Experience: At least 2 years Published: 14 Feb 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Bachelor/Honors Experience At least 2 years The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s): Garments, Textile Additional Requirements Age 25 to 35 years You can also send your CV to career@vklbd.com, mentioning the job position in the subject line Responsibilities & Context Manage end-to-end payroll processing for factory employees (staff and workers). Collect, verify, and consolidate attendance, overtime, leave records, and production-based incentives. Ensure accurate calculation of gross salary, deductions (PF, ESI, tax, advances, etc.), and net pay. Process payroll in compliance with company policies and statutory regulations. Maintain confidentiality and accuracy in all payroll-related matters. Coordinate with the production/HR team to maintain and verify daily attendance, overtime, and shift records. Monitor biometric/attendance software and resolve discrepancies. Prepare reports on absenteeism, daily OT cost and unauthorised OT cost, late arrivals, and shift patterns. Coordinate with the accounts/finance department for salary disbursement via bank (Brac and Bkash) or cash. Prepare monthly salary sheet, payslips, and payroll reconciliation reports. Prepare Yearly annual leave encashment report. Provide cost centre or department-wise wage summaries to management. Maintain accurate employee records (personal details, wage structure, statutory details, etc.) in HRMS/payroll software (GTR). Update employee records on joining, resignation, increment, promotion, or transfer. Ensure proper documentation of full & final settlements for resigned employees. Support internal and external payroll audits with necessary reports and documentation. Implement and monitor payroll control procedures to minimize errors and fraud. Conduct periodic reconciliation of payroll with attendance and finance records. Liaise with HR, Accounts, Production, and Compliance teams for smooth payroll operations. To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Responsibilities & Context Key Responsibilities A. Raw Material Quality Control Inspect and sample all incoming raw materials. Verify materials against approved specifications: Conduct on-site physical and rapid tests (where applicable). Ensure sampling is done scientifically and samples are properly labeled and retained. Accept or reject raw materials. Coordinate with Store to ensure segregation of accepted, and rejected materials. B. Finished Goods Quality Control Monitor finished feed quality for Pellet durability, Crumble size, Mash uniformity, Color & smell, Moisture level Ensure finished goods meet Nutritional formulation, and Physical appearance standards Retain reference samples batch-wise for traceability. C. In-Process Quality Control Monitor critical control points (CCPs) like Grinding (particle size), Mixing (CV value), Conditioning & pelleting temperature, Cooling & bagging etc. Ensure correct formulation & batching accuracy. Immediately report deviations and assist Production to take corrective action. Ensure proper cleaning & flushing between medicated and non-medicated feed. D. Documentation & Records Management Maintain accurate QA & QC documentation including Raw material inspection reports, Finished goods inspection reports, Batch records, Test results, Rejection & non-conformance reports etc. Maintain proper sample retention records. Compensation & Other Benefits Provident fund Salary Review: Yearly Festival Bonus: 2 Attractive remuneration package will be provided to the deserving candidates. Business: Sajeeb Group, a prominent business entity established in 1982, has flourished and diversified its operations across various sectors over the years. With a dedicated focus on maintaining exceptional quality, they prioritize rigorous Process Quality Control (PQC) at every production stage to meet international standards. The group adheres to strict factory compliances and sources raw materials from trusted suppliers, employing cutting-edge technology and 100% food-grade packaging to ensure top-tier product quality. Recently obtaining "100% Halal certification" for their food and beverage offerings reflects their commitment to market preferences. Their product range encompasses renowned global brands, showcasing strategic partnerships and manufacturing under established franchises. Notably, they`ve gained significant acclaim in both local and foreign markets for their high-quality offerings. Beyond the food and beverage sector, Sajeeb Group has diversified into agro-based products, agro-processing, real estate, insurance, readymade garments, telecommunications, and electronic media. Their global market expansion highlights a proactive approach in exploring potential markets for superior Bangladeshi products. Our Concerns 1. Sajeeb Corporation 2. Sajeeb Foods and Beverage Ltd 3. To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Responsibilities & Context Design Development: Create innovative and commercially viable designs for various garment categories (e.g., Knit & Sweaters) according to seasonal trends and buyer requirements. Sketching & Technical Drawing: Prepare detailed hand sketches or digital illustrations and create accurate technical packs (Tech Packs) including measurement charts and stitching details. Trend Analysis: Conduct extensive research on global fashion trends, fabric developments, color palettes, and silhouettes to stay ahead in the market. Fabric & Trim Selection: Source and select appropriate fabrics, trims, and accessories that align with the design aesthetics and cost constraints. Sample Supervision: Collaborate closely with the sampling department and pattern makers to ensure the initial samples match the design specifications and fit requirements. Product Development: Oversee the entire product development process from concept to the final approved golden sample. Communication with Buyers: Liaise with international or local buyers to understand their design visions and provide creative solutions or modifications as needed. Collaborate directly with buyers, presenting design concepts, samples, and specifications. Ensure client requirements and deadlines are met. Quality Control: Ensure that the final designs are feasible for mass production without compromising quality or increasing unnecessary costs. Work closely with the production and quality control teams to ensure designs meet the highest standards of quality and are produced within budget and timelines. Software Proficiency: Utilize design software such as Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop, and CLO 3D (if applicable) to create professional design presentations. Deadline Management: Ensure all design projects and sample developments are completed within the stipulated TNA (Time and Action) calendar. Manage and mentor a team of junior designers, providing guidance, feedback, and support to help them grow professionally. Skills & Expertise Suggested by Sketching Designing Garments Industry Sample Management Compensation & Other Benefits Mobile bill Salary Review: Yearly. Lunch Facilities: Partially Subsidize. To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Experience Additional Requirements Age At most 40 years Retired Army personnel (minimum rank: Sergeant) or retired Police Officer (Sub-Inspector/Inspector preferred). Age: Preferably 42–48 years or below. Minimum educational qualification:  (HSE, Bachelor’s degree preferred). Physically fit and mobile, with willingness to travel across Bangladesh. Proven experience in field operations, legal recovery, negotiation, or law enforcement. Familiarity with debt recovery laws, civil procedures, contract law, and consumer protection regulations. Communication and coordination ability with local administrative offices, law enforcement, and legal bodies. Motorcycle driving license is Mandatory . Must be able to handle challenging situations with integrity and professionalism. Responsibilities & Context We are seeking a disciplined, field-experienced, and tactically sound Legal and Recovery Officer to join our team. Ideal candidates will have a background in the Army (minimum rank: Sergeant) or Police Service (SI/Inspector preferred), with proven experience in handling legal matters, conflict resolution, and ensuring compliance in high-pressure situations. The role entails managing the legal recovery process, initiating legal action, and conducting field operations to recover overdue payments or assets in a lawful and professional manner. Prepare and file legal documents such as demand notices, lawsuits, and other court-related documents to initiate recovery proceedings. Analyze outstanding debts and identify cases suitable for legal action, assessing the legal merit and preparing appropriate strategies. Manage legal cases from initiation to resolution, including court schedules, deadlines, settlements, and case documentation. Ensure legal actions are fully compliant with applicable laws, regulations, and internal policies. Locate and professionally negotiate with absconding borrowers to recover outstanding assets or dues. Coordinate with police, civil administration, and legal representatives during high-risk or legally sensitive recovery operations. Act as a liaison with local authorities (e.g., Thana, Civil Office, Union Parishad) to ensure legal compliance and community engagement during recovery operations. Monitor overdue accounts and initiate timely recovery action plans. Excellent written and verbal communication skills in Bangla and basic English. Role Description: We are seeking a HEAD OF QUALITY DEPARTMENT - Planning, Production, and Quality for a full-time, on-site role in Dhaka, Bangladesh. The role involves overseeing the planning and production processes to ensure timely and efficient delivery. The manager will implement and monitor quality control systems, collaborate cross-functionally to meet production goals, and ensure compliance with industry standards. Additional responsibilities include providing leadership to the production team and identifying continuous improvement opportunities to optimize workflows and product quality. To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age At least 25 years Must have practical experience in Feed Mill. Should have good communication skills. Responsibilities & Context 2. Key Responsibilities A. Raw Material Quality Control Inspect and sample all incoming raw materials including: Verify materials against approved specifications: Conduct on-site physical and rapid tests (where applicable). Ensure sampling is done scientifically and samples are properly labeled and retained. Accept or reject raw materials. Coordinate with Store to ensure segregation of accepted, and rejected materials. B. Finished Goods Quality Control Monitor finished feed quality for Pellet durability, Crumble size, Mash uniformity, Color & smell, Moisture level Ensure finished goods meet Nutritional formulation, and Physical appearance standards Retain reference samples batch-wise for traceability. C. In-Process Quality Control Monitor critical control points (CCPs) like Grinding (particle size), Mixing (CV value), Conditioning & pelleting temperature, Cooling & bagging etc. Ensure correct formulation & batching accuracy. Immediately report deviations and assist Production to take corrective action. Ensure proper cleaning & flushing between medicated and non-medicated feed. D. বিল নং: 2026) মাধ্যমে পরিশোধ করে ট্রানজেকশন আইডি নম্বর সংগ্রহ করে আবেদন ফরমের নির্ধারিত জায়গায় পূরণ করতে হবে। ৩) লিখিত পরীক্ষা আগামী ৭ মার্চ ২০২৬ খ্রিঃ শনিবার, সকাল ১১:৩০ ঘটিকায় মজিদ জরিনা ফাউন্ডেশন স্কুল এন্ড কলেজে অনুষ্ঠিত হবে। প্রার্থীদের পরীক্ষায় অংশগ্রহণের জন্য কোনো টিএ/ডিএ প্রদান করা হবে না। ৪) লিখিত পরীক্ষায় অংশগ্রহণের সময় প্রার্থীদের আবেদনপত্রের অনলাইন কপিসহ সকল শিক্ষাগত যোগ্যতার সনদের ফটোকপি, অভিজ্ঞতার সনদের (যদি থাকে) ফটোকপি, জাতীয় পরিচয় পত্রের ফটোকপি ও সদ্য তোলা ০১ কপি পাসপোর্ট সাইজের রঙিন ছবি সঙ্গে আনতে হবে। ৫) নিয়োগপ্রাপ্ত শিক্ষক কর্তৃপক্ষের সিদ্ধান্ত মোতাবেক যে কোনো শ্রেণীতে পাঠদান/দায়িত্ব পালন করতে বাধ্য থাকবেন। উল্লেখ্য, কর্তৃপক্ষ কোনো কারণ দর্শানো ব্যতিরেকে নিয়োগ বিজ্ঞপ্তি/যেকোনো আবেদনপত্র স্থগিত/বাতিল করার ক্ষমতা রাখেন বি.দ্র: মেধা ও যোগ্যতার ভিত্তিতে যোগ্য প্রার্থীরাই নিয়োগপ্রাপ্ত হবেন। এজন্য কোনরূপ তদবির বা যোগাযোগ প্রার্থীর অযোগ্যতা হিসেবে বিবেচিত হবে। সভাপতি, গভর্নিং বডি মজিদ জরিনা ফাউন্ডেশন স্কুল এন্ড কলেজ নরকলিকাতা, ভোজেশ্বর, নড়িয়া, শরীয়তপুর। Apply Procedure Apply URL: https://www.mjfsc.edu.bd/ Company Information Mazid Jarina Foundation School & College Follow More jobs from this company Address: Norkolikata, Noreya,
